comment: Her lectures are worth attending. Not that it will impact your grade, but she makes the content really interesting. Was never bored during her lectures. Assignments are also easy and straightforward, few discussions and a paper.

Prof. Cofield's GEOG 1101 class was really interesting, they did a great job of explaining everything in a clear and understandable manner. The homework for the class was really easy, just discussion posts every other week and two papers. Overall just a really enjoyable class!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Very easy class I probably spent at most an hour of time outside of class finishing work.

No quizzes or tests, just discussion posts and a final paper to worry about. Only showed up to a couple of classes and they read off the ppts on D2L already with little extra information during lectures. The only difficulty was really the final paper with little information provided online and keeping up with the discussion posts every now and then

Took weather & climate, most difficult class by far. Many assignments, most very confusing. Course was extensive, very time consuming. Teacher was nice, tried to give some opportunities to raise grades towards the end.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: She was hired a few days before classes started so she was really crazy at first, everything is though connect, most things you can find online. She's really nice and smart but I stopped going to class because she never really taught what the homework was, super easy to reach out to though with any questions, will almost always gives extensions
